Umme Ahmed Shishir Wiki | Biography | Height | Photo | Family

Bolly Reporter
9 months ago

Umme Ahmed Shishir is a Bangladeshi American actress and professional model, mostly known as the wife of Shakib Al Hasan a Bangladeshi cricketer.

Early Life and Education

Umme Ahmed Shishir was born on 1989 in narayanganj, bangladesh. She handed her early life in narayanganj with family. she has five brothers and a sister. Her father Mamataj Ahmed became an employee of Agrani bank. in 1998, her father and stepmother moved to the united state with the dv lottery while she turned into only 8 years old. Umme’s stepmother got this lottery, years later she went to america. She finished graduation from minnesota college in the united states as a software engineer.

Umme Ahmed Shishir Career

Shishir is a public figure if though she is not an actress or professional model. Shishir has appeared on the television screen in a television commercial of Bangla link.In this TVC, she acted with her husband Shakib Al Hasan. Her acted TVC for Banglalink has made viral in the social media. Shishir is one of the desired women in the country of the young generation for her attractive appearance.

Personal Life

During her student life, Shishir went to England for visiting, dramatically that was time Shakib Al Hasan stayed in England for County Cricket League in 2010. However, they met one another and fall in love, continue their love relation for almost three years in silent mode. The couple married on the magic date 12th December 2012 at a five-star hotel. She gives birth a daughter on November 08, 2015, in the United States.

Controversy

During her student life, Shishir went to England for visiting, dramatically that was time Shakib Al Hasan stayed in England for County Cricket League in 2010. However, they met one another and fall in love, continue their love relation for almost three years in silent mode. The couple married on the magic date 12th December 2012 at a five-star hotel. She gives birth a daughter on November 08, 2015, in the United States.

In 2014, there were allegation that Rahid, the 23yr old and son of popular businessman Bazlur Rahman had sexually harassed her.
